column1: 5,Complete Purchase of Apple Product with Shipping Information,"Navigate to the homepage, select an Apple product, add it to the cart, and complete the checkout process by filling in shipping details. Verify the thank you page.","Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link apple -> Navigate to page 'category/*'
Step 8: Fill shipping information and complete the checkout process

column2: - Step 1: Click on button proceedToCheckout -> Navigate to page 'checkout/info'
- Step 2: Click on input email

- Step 18: Enter input value in input phone
- Step 19: Click on button continueToPayment -> Navigate to page 'checkout/payment'
- Step 20: Click on button completeOrder
